## getProjection() function

Returns the projection object specified in the parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getProjection(projectionName: string): Projection | never;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  projectionName | string | string describing projection to be used |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Projection](./harp-geoutils.projection.md) \| never
